record.jsxtip: Fires after the user makes a selection and before the state of this select control is updated. Canceling this event prevents the change of state of the select control.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record or the array of record jsxids if this is a multiselect.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user makes a selection.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record or the array of record jsxids if this is a multiselect.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this select loses focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this select gains focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this select control is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this select control before it is removed from the DOM.
